compare.sql: (SELECT [AddressID] ,[AddressLine1] ,[AddressLine2] ,[City] ,[StateProvinceID] ,[PostalCode] ,[ModifiedDate] FROM [AdventureWorks2008R2].[Person].[Address] where AddressID <> 1 UNION ALL SELECT [AddressID] ,[AddressLine1] ,[AddressLine2] ,[City] ,[StateProvinceID] ,[PostalCode] ,[ModifiedDate] FROM [AdventureWorks2008R2].[Person].[Address] where AddressID <> 2)

(SELECT [AddressID] ,[AddressLine1] ,[AddressLine2] ,[City] ,[StateProvinceID] ,[PostalCode] ,[ModifiedDate] FROM [AdventureWorks2008R2].[Person].[Address] where AddressID <> 1 UNION ALL SELECT [AddressID] ,[AddressLine1] ,[AddressLine2] ,[City] ,[StateProvinceID] ,[PostalCode] ,[ModifiedDate] FROM [AdventureWorks2008R2].[Person].[Address] where AddressID <> 2)
